item.title: About me
item.description: Short Bio I was born in Tetouan, a northern Mediterranean city in Morocco ü™¨ . When I was 3 years old, I moved to Tarragona üèñÔ∏è, another northern Mediterranean city in Spain, where I lived until it was time to start university. I pursued a double bachelor’s degree in Physics and Mathematics at the Autonomous University of Barcelona (UAB), focusing on Theoretical Physics (though I will always cherish my mathematician side ü§ì).
